messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] M-I-L
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m sure that it does.  I, too, have strawberry blond hair.  It is striking and almost everytime I go somewhere I have total strangers comment on it.  My
messages.messageBody:
> > Sh'e's also going on about food and exercise (my poor dog has had about 20
> walks in 2 days cos the woman is a compulsive exerciser).
> > She's commented on Rhodri's beautiful long strawberry blond hair and said
> it would look nice on a girl.
>
> It probably would. I'll bet it looks nice on *him*! <g>

I'm sure that it does. I, too, have strawberry blond hair. It is
striking and almost everytime I go somewhere I have total strangers
comment on it. My hair is really long, too, and today I am getting it
cut really short (I'm nervous). [I've been told by strangers to never
cut my hair, too.] I've been growing it really long to donate to Locks
of Love. So, if your son is ever wanting to cut his hair, have him
check out http://www.locksoflove.com Red and strawberry blond hair are
the most needed.

-Lisa in AZ

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] M-I-L
messages.msgSnippet: ... Its very strained. She can t help making little critical comments about how the kids will go to Oxford Univerisyt if they play Play-station all day. When I
messages.messageBody:
kbcdlovejo@... wrote:

> In a message dated 4/11/2003 2:28:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> shyrley.williams@... writes:
>
> > Mother-in Law bought them 10 bars each of an English candy bar
>
> So. How's that going, Shyrley?
>
> Mine wants more info on unschooling! <G>
>
> ~Kelly
>

Its very strained. She can't help making little critical comments about how the kids will go to Oxford Univerisyt if they play Play-station all day. When I try and explain unschooling she is sneering
etc etc
The woman is driving me crazy!!!!!!
Sh'e's also going on about food and exercise (my poor dog has had about 20 walks in 2 days cos the woman is a compulsive exerciser).
She's commented on Rhodri's beautiful long strawberry blond hair and said it would look nice on a girl.

Argh.

Shyrley
